projectInfo.name: Unity
projectInfo.description: Internal ERP system built with modern React stack

projectRules: Use Next.js 13 App Router structure (app/ directory) with clear component/layout separation
Write all code in TypeScript with strict typing (minimize 'any' usage)
Implement Supabase authentication using Auth UI or custom flows
Use React Query for data fetching/caching - avoid Redux unless necessary
Maintain organized Tailwind styling with global styles file
Implement forms using React Hook Form + Zod validation
Include comprehensive comments and proper TypeScript types
